name: Balsamic Chicken Fingers
preparation: Line a Sheet Pan with a Sheet Pan Liner. Preheat oven to 400° F.
Meanwhile, in a shallow dish, combine panko and cheese; set aside.
In a bowl, combine dressing mix with oil and vinegar.
Slice chicken into very thin strips; coat with dressing. Dredge in crumb mixture to evenly coat.
Arrange strips in a single layer on pan. Bake for 18 min, or until deep golden.
tips: Make it vegetarian by swapping meat for 1 lb (450 g) sliced firm tofu.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups mixed greens with 1 tbsp prepared Balsamic Vinaigrette and 1⁄4 cup prepared Marinara Sauce for dipping.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: A classic for a reason, this dressing mix is full of flavour and uber versatile. Use it as salad or nourish bowl dressing, marinade protein including chicken and beef, or glaze grilled veggies and fresh fruit. Any way you serve it, it’s sure to be a hit!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
